title: Dashboard Analytics
shortDescription: A modern analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization and interactive charts.
fullDescription: A comprehensive analytics dashboard built with React and Chart.js. Features include real-time data updates, customizable widgets, dark mode support, and responsive design. The dashboard provides insights into user behavior, sales metrics, and performance indicators.

title: E-Commerce Mobile App
shortDescription: A sleek mobile shopping app with cart management and secure checkout.
fullDescription: Full-featured e-commerce mobile application with product browsing, search functionality, wishlist, shopping cart, and secure payment integration. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility.

title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A clean, responsive portfolio template with smooth animations and dark mode.
fullDescription: A modern portfolio website template featuring smooth scroll animations, project showcases, contact form integration, and accessibility-first design. Fully responsive and optimized for performance.

title: Task Management App
shortDescription: A productivity app for organizing tasks with drag-and-drop functionality.
fullDescription: A Kanban-style task management application with features like drag-and-drop, task categories, due dates, priority levels, and team collaboration. Syncs across devices in real-time.
